langModel

Class NgramUtilTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • langModel.NgramUtilTest

  • public class NgramUtilTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This JUnit Test Class has been generated by right clicking on the MiscUtil class and selecting "New > Junit Test Case". After that, you have to select the methods for which you would like to generate tests. In practice, you will duplicate manually the test methods to possibly create several tests for one method. Your work is then to remove the fail parts and to implement each test. One method is given as an example To run them: either right click on the class name or simply on the method name and select "Run As Junit Test".
    Author:
    N. Hernandez and S. Quiniou (2015)
